Description: Located in South Boston's desirable Westside neighborhood, unique sun filled one bedroom unit. Featuring a galley style kitchen, open living and dining room with plenty of character including tall ceilings. The large bedroom offers two spacious closets with built in shelving and a modern en suite bathroom. Other amenities include common full size washer and dryer and private storage unit. Beautiful backyard to host friends and family. Close to West Broadway's shops and restaurants, public transportation, and the Seaport District.
